26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_engine_device_acpi.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:31 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "acpi.h"
30
31#include <core/device.h>
32
33#ifdef CONFIG_ACPI
34static int
35nvkm_acpi_ntfy(struct notifier_block *nb, unsigned long val, void *data)
36{
37 struct nvkm_device *device =
38 container_of(nb, typeof(*device), acpi.nb);
39 struct acpi_bus_event *info = data;
40
41 if (!strcmp(info->device_class, "ac_adapter"))
42 nvkm_event_send(&device->event, 1, 0, NULL, 0);
43
44 return NOTIFY_DONE;
45}
46#endif
47
48void
49nvkm_acpi_fini(struct nvkm_device *device)
50{
51#ifdef CONFIG_ACPI
52 unregister_acpi_notifier(&device->acpi.nb);
53#endif
54}
55
56void
57nvkm_acpi_init(struct nvkm_device *device)
58{
59#ifdef CONFIG_ACPI
60 device->acpi.nb.notifier_call = nvkm_acpi_ntfy;
61 register_acpi_notifier(&device->acpi.nb);
62#endif
63}
64
